name: Only You Can Get Out!
description:
Hello everyone,

I just released Only You Can Get Out! A Hyper focus abstract puzzle. You are a black square that needs to get out, but all the other yellow shapes follow your moves, and only the black square can get out.  

The controls are the Arrow keys ↑ ↓ → ← 😊

This game is a prototype (probably buggy) and to experiment an idea. Please leave a comment about your thoughts about the game.

I hope you enjoy it!

NOTE

  • If you get stuck click restart
  • Bugs? comment!
  • There is no sound in the game (it was on purpose)
